You try to open the door.It seems locked...You notice a pad on the wall in the shape of a handprint[To Yourself]₿Fancy gadgets we've got here, it seems...Pressing your hand against it, the door slams open andsuddenly you're sucked straight in. You find yourself instantly jettisoned into weightlessness.As you float around, you realize there's nothing slowing you down.You watch the stars tumble around you like a washing machine.Slowly you run out of oxygen...₽Or did you?₼start-redo.txt..
